general.gigTitle: design and develop responsive wordpress website design

sellerCard.description:
Hi there! we are a team of 8 members and have over 10-years experience in this Graphics Designing. we have Specific department for logo designing which known as vintage valley. we will design killer professional logos for your business. Our designs are crisp, modern and powerful.  I promise you will love my work and you will get world-class designs in the end.

Regards,
team leader.

description.content:
Hi, Welcome to my gig.


Team of Senior Web Designers & Developers. we focus on listening and understanding your requirements and then acting on your needs to deliver truly unique, engaging, and impactful WordPress website design.


Gig Key Features:

Professional and Eye-catching WordPress Website Design

Fully Responsive design

Speed, Security and SEO optimized

Royalty Free Images

Optimized image slider, Popup and CTAs for high-conversion

Email Marketing Platforms connection (Mailchimp, Aweber etc)

Social Media Platforms integration

Easy to edit Page Builder


SMALL 1 PAGE SITE :

1 Page Responsive and Optimized Website Design for Startups/Individuals to build an online presence. 


MEDIUM 5-10 PAGE SITE :

10 Pages Bespoke Highly professional WORDPRESS WEBSITE Design to make your Business stand out of competition.


FULL SIZE ECOMMERCE SITE :

Up to 15 Pages, 20 Products Premium Designed Fully Equipped E-commerce store to Bring your brand and products to life online, get closer to your end users, and increase your sales. 


Why me?

Unlimited Revisions

After Sale Support

Wordpress 360Â° (Custom Development)


Note: Kindly drop a message to discuss :)

reviews.comment: Exceeded my expectations! Very professional! I persuade anyone and everyone to go directly to him! He will do great works!
Very good.  The seller is responsive, communicates well and adjusts to the time zone differences for the client.  Controlled costs and works and plays well with others - LOL.  ;-)
very happy with the end product. site working very well and fast.
outstanding fast and quality work, will use again.
